mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.partnerNum FROM partner p JOIN hotel h ON h.partnerNum = p.partnerNum WHERE partnerId = #{partnerId}
SELECT hotelName FROM hotel h LEFT JOIN roomInfo r ON r.hotelNum = h.hotelNum WHERE h.hotelNum = #{hotelNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel(hotelNum, partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro,hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2 ) VALUES ( hotel_seq.NEXTVAL, (SELECT PARTNERNUM FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERID = #{partnerId}), #{hotelName}, #{hotelIntro}, #{hotelNumber}, #{hotelZip}, #{hotelAddr1}, #{hotelAddr2} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(HOTELNUM),0) + 1 AS HOTELNUM FROM HOTEL
SELECT h.hotelNum, p.partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2 FROM hotel h JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum WHERE p.partnerId = #{partnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelImage(imageFileNum AS hotelImageFileNum, hotelNum, saveFilename AS hotelSaveFilename) VALUES (hotelImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{hotelNum}, #{hotelSaveFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.roomNum FROM roomInfo r JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelNum = r.roomNum WHERE h.hotelNum = #{hotelNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomInfo(roomNum, hotelNum, roomName, roomPrice, roomHo, roomMen, roomOption, roomBed ) VALUES ( roomInfo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{hotelNum}, #{roomName}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomHo}, #{roomMen}, #{roomOption}, #{roomBed} )
mapper.select: SELECT roomNum, roomName, roomPrice, roomHo, roomMen, h.hotelName, h.hotelNum, h.partnerNum, roomOption, roomBed FROM roomInfo r JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelNum = r.hotelNum JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum WHERE p.partnerId = #{partnerId}
SELECT roomNum, h.hotelNum, roomName, roomPrice, roomHo, roomMen, roomOption, roomBed FROM roomInfo r JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelNum = r.hotelNum WHERE roomNum = #{roomNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomImage(imageFileNum AS roomImageFileNum, roomNum, saveFilename AS roomSaveFilename) VALUES (roomImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomNum}, #{roomSaveFilename})
